title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.6 - Assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.6 - Assistance

State Regulations

Except as set forth in section
4215.4
(c) of this

Part, an administering corporation may use trust fund proceeds deposited in a
minority and women revolving loan trust fund account to provide loans for
eligible projects undertaken by eligible businesses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4215.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
